abstract: Brazil's Senate votes 61 to 20 to remove Pres Dilma Rousseff from office for remainder of her term, finding her guilty of manipulating federal budget in effort to conceal nation's mounting economic problems; Rousseff's impeachment marks end to 13 years of leftist rule by Workers' Party, era in which Brazil's economy boomed.

headline.print_headline: Impeachment Vote Ousts President in a Brazil Engulfed by Scandal
headline.main: Dilma Rousseff Is Ousted as Brazil’s President in Impeachment Vote

snippet: The vote to convict Ms. Rousseff on charges of manipulating the federal budget was also a verdict on her leadership and Brazil’s eroding fortunes....
lead_paragraph: The vote to convict Ms. Rousseff on charges of manipulating the federal budget was also a verdict on her leadership and Brazil’s eroding fortunes.
